General Questions.question: Are MIDeL chapters free to use?
General Questions.answer: Yes! MIDeL was developed to be used free of charge by all members of the community. MIDeL is open source and free to use. Contributions are welcomed and encouraged by all memebres of the community.

General Questions.question: Who made this "book"?
General Questions.answer: MIDeL is developed by the Mayo Clinic's Radiology Informatics Lab (RIL).

General Questions.question: I found an issue with one of the chapters, what should I do?
General Questions.answer: If you find issues in chapter notebooks, please open an issue on our GitHub page. Even if you have the solution, we encourage you to submit a pull request.
